snippet: Ho, ho, ho, SantaCon has got to go.
abstract: Op-Ed article by writer Jason O Gilbert deplores annual event known as SantaCon, in which people dressed as Santa Claus go on bar crawls in cities across the world; contends event should not be allowed to take place in New York City, since it shuts down and befouls dozens of blocks; calls on police force to increase its presence and to ticket aggressively.
lead_paragraph: Ho, ho, ho, SantaCon has got to go.
